Celestial Sigil.name: Celestial Sigil
Celestial Sigil.fullText:
Celestial Scholar Attack 11Celestial Sigil

An arcane pattern appears briefly on your arms as you snatch power from the cosmos and hurl it toward a foe.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement ; Varies
Standard Action      Ranged 20

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage

  Effect: If you hit with this power, you gain an effect based on your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase.

    Phase of the Sun: Enemies within 2 squares of you take fire and radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier.

    Phase of the Moon: Adjacent enemies take radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier and take a -2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

    Phase of the Stars: You teleport a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier as a free action.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 43.
Celestial Sigil.flavor: An arcane pattern appears briefly on your arms as you snatch power from the cosmos and hurl it toward a foe.
Celestial Sigil.effect: If you hit with this power, you gain an effect based on your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase.
Celestial Sigil.phaseOfTheSun: Enemies within 2 squares of you take fire and radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Celestial Sigil.phaseOfTheMoon: Adjacent enemies take radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier and take a -2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.
Celestial Sigil.phaseOfTheStars: You teleport a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier as a free action.

Celestial Resistance.name: Celestial Resistance
Celestial Resistance.fullText:
Celestial Scholar Utility 12Celestial Resistance

You transform your resistance to ward against a different kind of threat.

Encounter        Arcane
Free Action      Personal

Effect: You can change the resistance granted by your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase to the type of a different phase (cold, psychic, or radiant), or you can increase your resistance against the current type by 5. This benefit lasts until you change your phase.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 43.
Celestial Resistance.flavor: You transform your resistance to ward against a different kind of threat.
Celestial Resistance.effect: You can change the resistance granted by your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase to the type of a different phase (cold, psychic, or radiant), or you can increase your resistance against the current type by 5. This benefit lasts until you change your phase.

Celestial Seal.name: Celestial Seal
Celestial Seal.fullText:
Celestial Scholar Attack 20Celestial Seal

Your foe is surrounded by celestial lights and held in place by cosmic bindings.

Daily        Arcane, Implement ; Varies
Standard Action      Ranged 20

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier damage. For this attackâ€™s damage, choose two damage types from among cold, psychic, and radiant.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: The target is immobilized (save ends). This effect has an additional benefit based on your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase.

  Blazing Sun: The target takes fire and radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier.

  Watching Moon: The target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of its next turn.

  Distant Stars: You teleport the target 3 squares.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 43.
Celestial Seal.flavor: Your foe is surrounded by celestial lights and held in place by cosmic bindings.
Celestial Seal.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier damage. For this attackâ€™s damage, choose two damage types from among cold, psychic, and radiant.
Celestial Seal.effect: The target is immobilized (save ends). This effect has an additional benefit based on your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase.
Celestial Seal.blazingSun: The target takes fire and radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Celestial Seal.watchingMoon: The target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of its next turn.
